item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
P1001-A+B Problem

题目:

题目描述:

输入两个整数 a,ba,ba,b，输出它们的和（∣a∣,∣b∣≤109|a|,|b|\leq 10^9∣a∣,∣b∣≤109）。

item.title: P4287-[SHOI2011]双倍回文
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
P4287-[SHOI2011]双倍回文

题目:

题目描述:

记字符串www的倒置为wRw^RwR。例如(abcd)R=dcba(abcd)^R=dcba(abcd)R=dcba，(abba)R=abba(abba)^R=abba(abba)R=abba。

item.title: CF383C-Propagating tree
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF383C-Propagating tree

题目:

题目描述:

Iahub likes trees very much. Recently he discovered an interesting tree named propagating tree. The tree consists of n n n nodes numbered from 1 1 1 to n n n , each node i i i having an initial value ai a_{i} ai​ . The root of the tree is node 1 1 1 .

item.title: CF85D-Sum of Medians
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF85D-Sum of Medians

题目:

题目描述:

In one well-known algorithm of finding the k k k -th order statistics we should divide all elements into groups of five consecutive elements and find the median of each five. A median is called the middle element of a sorted array (it’s the third largest element for a group of five). To increase the algorithm’s performance speed on a modern video card, you should be able to find a sum of medians in each five of the array.

item.title: CF280C-Game on Tree
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF280C-Game on Tree

题目:

题目描述:

Momiji has got a rooted tree, consisting of n n n nodes. The tree nodes are numbered by integers from 1 1 1 to n n n . The root has number 1 1 1 . Momiji decided to play a game on this tree.

item.title: CF19E-Fairy
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF19E-Fairy

题目:

题目描述:

Once upon a time there lived a good fairy A. One day a fine young man B came to her and asked to predict his future. The fairy looked into her magic ball and said that soon the fine young man will meet the most beautiful princess ever and will marry her. Then she drew on a sheet of paper n n n points and joined some of them with segments, each of the segments starts in some point and ends in some other point. Having drawn that picture, she asked the young man to erase one of the segments from the sheet. Then she tries to colour each point red or blue so, that there is no segment having points of the same colour as its ends. If she manages to do so, the prediction will come true. B wants to meet the most beautiful princess, that’s why he asks you to help him. Find all the segments that will help him to meet the princess.

item.title: P4248-[AHOI2013]差异

P4248-[AHOI2013]差异

item.title: P3763-[TJOI2017]DNA
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
P3763-[TJOI2017]DNA

题目:

题目描述:

加里敦大学的生物研究所，发现了决定人喜不喜欢吃藕的基因序列 SSS,有这个序列的碱基序列就会表现出喜欢吃藕的性状，但是研究人员发现对碱基序列 SSS，任意修改其中不超过 333 个碱基，依然能够表现出吃藕的性状。现在研究人员想知道这个基因在 DNA 链 S0S_0S0​ 上的位置。所以你需要统计在一个表现出吃藕性状的人的 DNA 序列 S0S_0S0​ 上，有多少个连续子串可能是该基因，即有多少个 S0S_0S0​ 的连续子串修改小于等于三个字母能够变成 SSS。

item.title: CF1458C-Latin Square
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF1458C-Latin Square

题目:

题目描述:

You are given a square matrix of size n n n . Every row and every column of this matrix is a permutation of 1 1 1 , 2 2 2 , … \ldots … , n n n . Let ai,j a_{i, j} ai,j​ be the element at the intersection of i i i -th row and j j j -th column for every 1≤i,j≤n 1 \leq i, j \leq n 1≤i,j≤n . Rows are numbered 1,…,n 1, \ldots, n 1,…,n top to bottom, and columns are numbered 1,…,n 1, \ldots, n 1,…,n left to right.

item.title: CF1458B-Glass Half Spilled
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF1458B-Glass Half Spilled

题目:

题目描述:

There are n n n glasses on the table numbered 1,…,n 1, \ldots, n 1,…,n . The glass i i i can hold up to ai a_i ai​ units of water, and currently contains bi b_i bi​ units of water.

item.title: CF1458A-Row GCD
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF1458A-Row GCD

题目:

题目描述:

You are given two positive integer sequences a1,…,an a_1, \ldots, a_n a1​,…,an​ and b1,…,bm b_1, \ldots, b_m b1​,…,bm​ . For each j=1,…,m j = 1, \ldots, m j=1,…,m find the greatest common divisor of a1+bj,…,an+bj a_1 + b_j, \ldots, a_n + b_j a1​+bj​,…,an​+bj​ .

item.title: CF1463E-Plan of Lectures
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF1463E-Plan of Lectures

题目:

题目描述:

Ivan is a programming teacher. During the academic year, he plans to give n n n lectures on n n n different topics. Each topic should be used in exactly one lecture. Ivan wants to choose which topic will he explain during the 1 1 1 -st, 2 2 2 -nd, …, n n n -th lecture — formally, he wants to choose some permutation of integers from 1 1 1 to n n n (let’s call this permutation q q q ). qi q_i qi​ is the index of the topic Ivan will explain during the i i i -th lecture.

item.title: CF1463D-Pairs
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF1463D-Pairs

题目:

题目描述:

You have 2n 2n 2n integers 1,2,…,2n 1, 2, \dots, 2n 1,2,…,2n . You have to redistribute these 2n 2n 2n elements into n n n pairs. After that, you choose x x x pairs and take minimum elements from them, and from the other n−x n - x n−x pairs, you take maximum elements.

item.title: CF1463B-Find The Array
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF1463B-Find The Array

题目:

题目描述:

You are given an array [a1,a2,…,an] [a_1, a_2, \dots, a_n] [a1​,a2​,…,an​] such that 1≤ai≤109 1 \le a_i \le 10^9 1≤ai​≤109 . Let S S S be the sum of all elements of the array a a a .

item.title: CF1463A-Dungeon
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF1463A-Dungeon

题目:

题目描述:

You are playing a new computer game in which you have to fight monsters. In a dungeon you are trying to clear, you met three monsters; the first of them has a a a health points, the second has b b b health points, and the third has c c c .

item.title: CF1455D-Sequence and Swaps
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF1455D-Sequence and Swaps

题目:

题目描述:

You are given a sequence a a a consisting of n n n integers a1,a2,…,an a_1, a_2, \dots, a_n a1​,a2​,…,an​ , and an integer x x x . Your task is to make the sequence a a a sorted (it is considered sorted if the condition a1≤a2≤a3≤⋯≤an a_1 \le a_2 \le a_3 \le \dots \le a_n a1​≤a2​≤a3​≤⋯≤an​ holds).

item.title: CF1455B-Jumps
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF1455B-Jumps

题目:

题目描述:

You are standing on the OX \mathit{OX} OX -axis at point 0 0 0 and you want to move to an integer point x>0 x > 0 x>0 .

item.title: CF1455A-Strange Functions
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF1455A-Strange Functions

题目:

题目描述:

Let’s define a function f(x) f(x) f(x) ( x x x is a positive integer) as follows: write all digits of the decimal representation of x x x backwards, then get rid of the leading zeroes. For example, f(321)=123 f(321) = 123 f(321)=123 , f(120)=21 f(120) = 21 f(120)=21 , f(1000000)=1 f(1000000) = 1 f(1000000)=1 , f(111)=111 f(111) = 111 f(111)=111 .

item.title: CF757F-Team Rocket Rises Again
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF757F-Team Rocket Rises Again

题目:

题目描述:

It’s the turn of the year, so Bash wants to send presents to his friends. There are n n n cities in the Himalayan region and they are connected by m m m bidirectional roads. Bash is living in city s s s . Bash has exactly one friend in each of the other cities. Since Bash wants to surprise his friends, he decides to send a Pikachu to each of them. Since there may be some cities which are not reachable from Bash’s city, he only sends a Pikachu to those friends who live in a city reachable from his own city. He also wants to send it to them as soon as possible.

item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF1451C-String Equality

题目:

题目描述:

Ashish has two strings a a a and b b b , each of length n n n , and an integer k k k . The strings only contain lowercase English letters.

item.title: CF1451B-Non-Substring Subsequence
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF1451B-Non-Substring Subsequence

题目:

题目描述:

Hr0d1y has q q q queries on a binary string s s s of length n n n . A binary string is a string containing only characters ‘0’ and ‘1’.

item.title: CF915F-Imbalance Value of a Tree
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF915F-Imbalance Value of a Tree

题目:

题目描述:

You are given a tree T T T consisting of n n n vertices. A number is written on each vertex; the number written on vertex i i i is ai a_{i} ai​ . Let’s denote the function I(x,y) I(x,y) I(x,y) as the difference between maximum and minimum value of ai a_{i} ai​ on a simple path connecting vertices x x x and y y y .

item.title: P5495-Dirichlet 前缀和
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
P5495-Dirichlet 前缀和

题目:

题目描述:

给定一个长度为 nnn 的数列 a1,a2,a3,…,ana_1,a_2,a_3,\dots,a_na1​,a2​,a3​,…,an​。

item.title: P4728-[HNOI2009]双递增序列
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
P4728-[HNOI2009]双递增序列

题目:

题目描述:

考虑一个长度为偶数 nnn 的序列 a1,a2,…,ana_1, a_2, \dots, a_na1​,a2​,…,an​，我们称这个序列为好的，当且仅当存在 a1,a2,…,ana_1, a_2, \dots, a_na1​,a2​,…,an​ 的一个划分 U={ai1,ai2,…,ain/2},V={aj1,aj2,…,ajn/2}={a1,a2,…,an}−UU=\{ a_{i_1}, a_{i_2}, \dots, a_{i_{n/2}} \}, V=\{ a_{j_1}, a_{j_2}, \dots, a_{j_{n/2}} \}=\{ a_1, a_2, \dots, a_n \}-UU={ai1​​,ai2​​,…,ain/2​​},V={aj1​​,aj2​​,…,ajn/2​​}={a1​,a2​,…,an​}−U，且 i1<i2<⋯<in/2,ai1<ai2<⋯<ain/2,j1<j2<⋯<jn/2,aj1<aj2<⋯<ajn/2i_1<i_2< \dots <i_{n/2}, a_{i_1}<a_{i_2}< \dots <a_{i_{n/2}}, j_1<j_2< \dots <j_{n/2}, a_{j_1}<a_{j_2}< \dots <a_{j_{n/2}}i1​<i2​<⋯<in/2​,ai1​​<ai2​​<⋯<ain/2​​,j1​<j2​<⋯<jn/2​,aj1​​<aj2​​<⋯<ajn/2​​。

item.title: P3224-[HNOI2012]永无乡
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
P3224-[HNOI2012]永无乡

题目:

题目描述:

永无乡包含 nnn 座岛，编号从 111 到 nnn ，每座岛都有自己的独一无二的重要度，按照重要度可以将这 nnn 座岛排名，名次用 111 到 nnn 来表示。某些岛之间由巨大的桥连接，通过桥可以从一个岛到达另一个岛。如果从岛 aaa 出发经过若干座（含 000 座）桥可以 到达岛 bbb ，则称岛 aaa 和岛 bbb 是连通的。

item.title: P5205-【模板】多项式开根
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
P5205-【模板】多项式开根

题目:

题目描述:

给定一个n−1n-1n−1次多项式A(x)A(x)A(x)，求一个在 mod  xn\bmod\ x^nmod xn意义下的多项式B(x)B(x)B(x)，使得B2(x)≡A(x) ( mod  xn)B^2(x) \equiv A(x) \ (\bmod\ x^n)B2(x)≡A(x) (mod xn)。若有多解，请取零次项系数较小的作为答案。

item.title: CF662B-Graph Coloring
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF662B-Graph Coloring

题目:

题目描述:

You are given an undirected graph that consists of n n n vertices and m m m edges. Initially, each edge is colored either red or blue. Each turn a player picks a single vertex and switches the color of all edges incident to it. That is, all red edges with an endpoint in this vertex change the color to blue, while all blue edges with an endpoint in this vertex change the color to red.

item.title: CF1120D-Power Tree
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF1120D-Power Tree

题目:

题目描述:

You are given a rooted tree with n n n vertices, the root of the tree is the vertex 1 1 1 . Each vertex has some non-negative price. A leaf of the tree is a non-root vertex that has degree 1 1 1 .

item.title: CF835F-Roads in the Kingdom
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF835F-Roads in the Kingdom

题目:

题目描述:

In the Kingdom K., there are n n n towns numbered with integers from 1 1 1 to n n n . The towns are connected by n n n bi-directional roads numbered with integers from 1 1 1 to n n n . The i i i -th road connects the towns ui u_{i} ui​ and vi v_{i} vi​ and its length is li l_{i} li​ . There is no more than one road between two towns. Also, there are no roads that connect the towns with itself.

item.title: CF165D-Beard Graph
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF165D-Beard Graph

题目:

题目描述:

Let’s define a non-oriented connected graph of n n n vertices and n−1 n-1 n−1 edges as a beard, if all of its vertices except, perhaps, one, have the degree of 2 or 1 (that is, there exists no more than one vertex, whose degree is more than two). Let us remind you that the degree of a vertex is the number of edges that connect to it.

item.title: CF1045G-AI robots
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF1045G-AI robots

题目:

题目描述:

In the last mission, MDCS has successfully shipped N N N AI robots to Mars. Before they start exploring, system initialization is required so they are arranged in a line. Every robot can be described with three numbers: position ( xi x_i xi​ ), radius of sight ( ri r_i ri​ ) and IQ ( qi q_i qi​ ).

item.title: CF1416C-XOR Inverse
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF1416C-XOR Inverse

题目:

题目描述:

You are given an array a a a consisting of n n n non-negative integers. You have to choose a non-negative integer x x x and form a new array b b b of size n n n according to the following rule: for all i i i from 1 1 1 to n n n , bi=ai⊕x b_i = a_i \oplus x bi​=ai​⊕x ( ⊕ \oplus ⊕ denotes the operation bitwise XOR).

item.title: CF1416B-Make Them Equal
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF1416B-Make Them Equal

题目:

题目描述:

You are given an array a a a consisting of n n n positive integers, numbered from 1 1 1 to n n n . You can perform the following operation no more than 3n 3n 3n times:

item.title: CF1416A-k-Amazing Numbers
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF1416A-k-Amazing Numbers

题目:

题目描述:

You are given an array a a a consisting of n n n integers numbered from 1 1 1 to n n n .

item.title: P4381-[IOI2008]Island
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
P4381-[IOI2008]Island

题目:

题目描述:

你准备浏览一个公园，该公园由 NNN 个岛屿组成，当地管理部门从每个岛屿 iii 出发向另外一个岛屿建了一座长度为 LiL_iLi​ 的桥，不过桥是可以双向行走的。同时，每对岛屿之间都有一艘专用的往来两岛之间的渡船。相对于乘船而言，你更喜欢步行。你希望经过的桥的总长度尽可能长，但受到以下的限制：

item.title: P4068-[SDOI2016]数字配对
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
P4068-[SDOI2016]数字配对

题目:

题目描述:

有 n 种数字，第 i 种数字是 aia_iai​、有 bib_ibi​ 个，权值是 cic_ici​。

item.title: CF505E-Mr. Kitayuta vs. Bamboos
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF505E-Mr. Kitayuta vs. Bamboos

题目:

题目描述:

Mr. Kitayuta’s garden is planted with n n n bamboos. (Bamboos are tall, fast-growing tropical plants with hollow stems.) At the moment, the height of the i i i -th bamboo is hi h_{i} hi​ meters, and it grows ai a_{i} ai​ meters at the end of each day.

item.title: P3761-[TJOI2017]城市
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
P3761-[TJOI2017]城市

题目:

题目描述:

从加里敦大学城市规划专业毕业的小明来到了一个地区城市规划局工作。这个地区一共有 nnn 座城市，n−1n-1n−1 条高速公路，保证了任意两运城市之间都可以通过高速公路相互可达，但是通过一条高速公路需要收取一定的交通费用。小明对这个地区深入研究后，觉得这个地区的交通费用太贵。

item.title: P3177-[HAOI2015]树上染色
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
P3177-[HAOI2015]树上染色

题目:

题目描述:

有一棵点数为 nnn 的树，树边有边权。给你一个在 0∼n0 \sim n0∼n 之内的正整数 kkk ，你要在这棵树中选择 kkk 个点，将其染成黑色，并将其他 的 n−kn-kn−k 个点染成白色。将所有点染色后，你会获得黑点两两之间的距离加上白点两两之间的距离的和的受益。问受益最大值是多少。

item.title: P3523-[POI2011]DYN-Dynamite
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
P3523-[POI2011]DYN-Dynamite

题目:

题目描述:

The Byteotian Cave is composed of nnn chambers and n−1n-1n−1 corridors that connect them. For every pair of chambers there is unique way to move from one of them to another without leaving the cave.

item.title: CF1285E-Delete a Segment
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF1285E-Delete a Segment

题目:

题目描述:

There are n n n segments on a Ox Ox Ox axis [l1,r1] [l_1, r_1] [l1​,r1​] , [l2,r2] [l_2, r_2] [l2​,r2​] , …, [ln,rn] [l_n, r_n] [ln​,rn​] . Segment [l,r] [l, r] [l,r] covers all points from l l l to r r r inclusive, so all x x x such that l≤x≤r l \le x \le r l≤x≤r .

item.title: CF1399F-Yet Another Segments Subset
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF1399F-Yet Another Segments Subset

题目:

题目描述:

You are given n n n segments on a coordinate axis OX OX OX . The i i i -th segment has borders [li;ri] [l_i; r_i] [li​;ri​] . All points x x x , for which li≤x≤ri l_i \le x \le r_i li​≤x≤ri​ holds, belong to the i i i -th segment.

item.title: P3648-[APIO2014]序列分割
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
P3648-[APIO2014]序列分割

题目:

题目描述:

item.title: CF1398F-Controversial Rounds
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF1398F-Controversial Rounds

题目:

题目描述:

Alice and Bob play a game. The game consists of several sets, and each set consists of several rounds. Each round is won either by Alice or by Bob, and the set ends when one of the players has won x x x rounds in a row. For example, if Bob won five rounds in a row and x=2 x = 2 x=2 , then two sets ends.

item.title: CF1398C-Good Subarrays
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)

CF1398C-Good Subarrays

A subarray al,al+1,al+2,…,ar−1,ar a_l, a_{l+1}, a_{l+2}, \dots , a_{r-1}, a_r al​,al+1​,al+2​,…,ar−1​,ar​ is good if the sum of elements of this subarray is equal to the length of this subarray ( ∑i=lrai=r−l+1 \sum\limits_{i=l}^{r} a_i = r - l + 1 i=l∑r​ai​=r−l+1 ).

item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF1389A-LCM Problem

题目描述:

Let LCM(x,y) LCM(x, y) LCM(x,y) be the minimum positive integer that is divisible by both x x x and y y y . For example, LCM(13,37)=481 LCM(13, 37) = 481 LCM(13,37)=481 , LCM(9,6)=18 LCM(9, 6) = 18 LCM(9,6)=18 .

item.title: CF1179D-Fedor Runs for President
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF1179D-Fedor Runs for President

题目:

题目描述:

Fedor runs for president of Byteland! In the debates, he will be asked how to solve Byteland’s transport problem. It’s a really hard problem because of Byteland’s transport system is now a tree (connected graph without cycles). Fedor’s team has found out in the ministry of transport of Byteland that there is money in the budget only for one additional road. In the debates, he is going to say that he will build this road as a way to maximize the number of distinct simple paths in the country. A simple path is a path which goes through every vertex no more than once. Two simple paths are named distinct if sets of their edges are distinct.

item.title: CF1388B-Captain Flint and a Long Voyage
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)

item.title: CF1391C-Cyclic Permutations
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF1391C-Cyclic Permutations

题目:

题目描述:

A permutation of length n n n is an array consisting of n n n distinct integers from 1 1 1 to n n n in arbitrary order. For example, [2,3,1,5,4] [2,3,1,5,4] [2,3,1,5,4] is a permutation, but [1,2,2] [1,2,2] [1,2,2] is not a permutation ( 2 2 2 appears twice in the array) and [1,3,4] [1,3,4] [1,3,4] is also not a permutation ( n=3 n=3 n=3 but there is 4 4 4 in the array).

item.title: P2495-[SDOI2011]消耗战
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
P2495-[SDOI2011]消耗战

题目:

题目描述:

在一场战争中，战场由 nnn 个岛屿和 n−1n-1n−1 个桥梁组成，保证每两个岛屿间有且仅有一条路径可达。现在，我军已经侦查到敌军的总部在编号为 111 的岛屿，而且他们已经没有足够多的能源维系战斗，我军胜利在望。已知在其他 kkk 个岛屿上有丰富能源，为了防止敌军获取能源，我军的任务是炸毁一些桥梁，使得敌军不能到达任何能源丰富的岛屿。由于不同桥梁的材质和结构不同，所以炸毁不同的桥梁有不同的代价，我军希望在满足目标的同时使得总代价最小。

item.title: CF437D-The Child and Zoo
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF437D-The Child and Zoo

题目:

题目描述:

Of course our child likes walking in a zoo. The zoo has n n n areas, that are numbered from 1 1 1 to n n n . The i i i -th area contains ai a_{i} ai​ animals in it. Also there are m m m roads in the zoo, and each road connects two distinct areas. Naturally the zoo is connected, so you can reach any area of the zoo from any other area using the roads.

item.title: CF962F-Simple Cycles Edges
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
CF962F-Simple Cycles Edges

题目:

题目描述:

You are given an undirected graph, consisting of n n n vertices and m m m edges. The graph does not necessarily connected. Guaranteed, that the graph does not contain multiple edges (more than one edges between a pair of vertices) or loops (edges from a vertex to itself).

item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
P4035-[JSOI2008]球形空间产生器

题目:

题目描述:

有一个球形空间产生器能够在 nnn 维空间中产生一个坚硬的球体。现在，你被困在了这个 nnn 维球体中，你只知道球面上 n+1n+1n+1 个点的坐标，你需要以最快的速度确定这个 nnn 维球体的球心坐标，以便于摧毁这个球形空间产生器。

item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)

P4170-[CQOI2007]涂色

题目描述:

假设你有一条长度为 555 的木版，初始时没有涂过任何颜色。你希望把它的 555 个单位长度分别涂上红、绿、蓝、绿、红色，用一个长度为 555 的字符串表示这个目标：RGBGR。

item.title: P1351-联合权值
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
P1351-联合权值

题目:

题目描述:

无向连通图 GGG 有 nnn 个点，n−1n-1n−1 条边。点从 111 到 nnn 依次编号, 编号为 iii 的点的权值为 WiW_iWi​，每条边的长度均为 111。图上两点 (u,v)(u, v)(u,v) 的距离定义为 uuu 点到 vvv 点的最短距离。对于图 GGG 上的点对 (u,v)(u, v)(u,v)，若它们的距离为 222，则它们之间会产生Wv×WuW_v \times W_uWv​×Wu​ 的联合权值。

item.title: P3172-[CQOI2015]选数
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
P3172-[CQOI2015]选数

题目:

题目描述:

我们知道，从区间 [L,H][L,H][L,H]（LLL 和 HHH 为整数）中选取 NNN 个整数，总共有 (H−L+1)N(H-L+1)^N(H−L+1)N 种方案。小 z 很好奇这样选出的数的最大公约数的规律，他决定对每种方案选出的 NNN 个整数都求一次最大公约数，以便进一步研究。然而他很快发现工作量太大了，于是向你寻求帮助。你的任务很简单，小 z 会告诉你一个整数 KKK，你需要回答他最大公约数刚好为 KKK 的选取方案有多少个。由于方案数较大，你只需要输出其除以 109+710^9+7109+7 的余数即可。

item.title: P4180-[BJWC2010]严格次小生成树
item.author: ybw051114@qq.com (MoonWonder)
item.description:
P4180-[BJWC2010]严格次小生成树

题目:

题目描述:

小 C 最近学了很多最小生成树的算法，Prim 算法、Kurskal 算法、消圈算法等等。正当小 C 洋洋得意之时，小 P 又来泼小 C 冷水了。小 P 说，让小 C 求出一个无向图的次小生成树，而且这个次小生成树还得是严格次小的，也就是说：如果最小生成树选择的边集是 EM，严格次小生成树选择的边集是 ES，那么需要满足：(value(e)表示边 e 的权值) ∑e∈EMvalue(e)<∑e∈ESvalue(e)\sum_{e \in E_M}value(e)<\sum_{e \in E_S}value(e)∑e∈EM​​value(e)<∑e∈ES​​value(e)
